metadata.name: 30R
metadata.description:
Planes are not real birds but still flying and majestic...  
30R is the main Montpellier airport runway.

This photograph has a nice story in many ways, here is why:  
This shot was taken at an operative airport from a helicopter, allowing me to fly above working planes and shoot almost what I want.

It has been awarded in the "International B&W Spider Awards" in 2020, 3rd place.

It's an animated piece paired with a physical piece for Augmented reality use, you can print it yourself with a high-quality file provided or get the original print from me on ©Kodak Metallic + ©Dibond aluminum 3mm 40x60cm (15x24inch).  
The animation overlays on physical print when viewed through your phone.  
Here is the example video:  
https://www.philippesheraf.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/04/AR_30R_f.mp4

When I started animating this piece it gave it a new perspective, improved my creativity and to me, build a bridge between physical and digital art.

attributes.value: Print on Kodak Metallic & 3mm Dibond Aluminum

Can be used to display privately, or in commercial and non-commercial settings, or in groups with an unlimited number of participants. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works
Money reward from my company Olo Art every time this piece will be exhibited in airports, starts in January 2023 - Stay tuned for details
